channel.title: Zdr portal problems, and people cant connect to client
channel.description:
In my ZDR base, when you login you'll see the portals, but say i enter i wont see those portals unless i log in and out.
Also, I have everything port forwarded right, I believe but people still cant log into the client, so where exactly do I add the server Ip in the client.java, if you can help remotely, add my msn : mitcha0624@hotmail.com, or post thanks

item.title: Zdr portal problems, and people cant connect to client
item.dc:creator: @fury_upon_u fury upon u
item.description:
@fury_upon_u wrote:

do u have the right client becuz zdr can only connect to certain clients.Also do you have ur no-ip on when ppl try to join?

Read full topic
